<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollectorbase/#a82d3a5e3836b2c1ccd1e2ee012bfa586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringset">StringSet&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollectorbase/#a82d3a5e3836b2c1ccd1e2ee012bfa586">Seen</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Captures file system interaction and generates data to be later replayed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with the RedirectingFileSystem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For any file that gets accessed we eventually create:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - a copy of the file inside Root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - a record in RedirectingFileSystem mapping that maps:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   current real path -&gt; path to the copy in Root</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// That intent is that later when the mapping is used by RedirectingFileSystem</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it simulates the state of FS that we collected.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We generate file copies and mapping lazily - see writeMapping and copyFiles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We don&#39;t try to capture the state of the file at the exact time when it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// accessed. Files might get changed, deleted ... we record only the &quot;final&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In order to preserve the relative topology of files we use their real paths</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as relative paths inside of the Root.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollector/#a2da94c8c4b02f2361f1add04a67b0a47">FileCollector</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/filecollectorbase/#a8df2858d4a32c8a536815dcb01643400">FileCollectorBase</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// path and a path to copy from.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// in the directory, using \\a CachedDirs to avoid redundant lookups, but</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Copy the files into the root directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
